headline: Senior Partner Manager at Nethope
summary: Information technology professional with over 20 years of leadership roles across consumer goods, pharma, health care, international development. Delivers digital transformation programmes, business and organisational change. Deep experience in programme management, ERP implementation, master data management, process digitisation, business process design, change management.

experiences.title: Chief Digital and Technology Officer, Europe and Middle East
Senior Manager Consulting, Applications Delivery and Advisory
experiences.description:
Helping clients realise and deliver their business strategy through the use of business applications that enable automation, complex problem solving, integration of business functions and information management. 

Providing consulting services throughout the project lifecycle, from strategy and advisory, through to design and implementation; addressing the Finance and Supply Chain functions, and working with the most innovative and market leading business application providers today.

experiences.title: Consulting Manager Manufacturing & Distribution Industries, EMEA
experiences.description:
Responsible for Industry Consulting for Manufacturing, CPG, Retail, Life Sciences, Energy & Utilities and Transportation across Europe, Middle East and Africa
• Business development and solution architecture for applications outsourcing and development programmes: support of client facing sales activities; shaping and solutioning of outsourcing contracts
• Sale and delivery of applications consulting services: ERP Implementation; Software selection; Solution assessment 
• Offering development for industry specific application services in areas such as Retail Store, Supply Chain Visibility, Smart Meter/Smart Grid; Automotive Dealer Management, Product Development and Engineering, Factory Operations. Definition of offerings, development of client opportunities and delivery capabilities.

experiences.title: IS Manager Supply, Developing Markets
experiences.description:
Responsible for Supply systems in Latin America, Asia, Africa and Middle East.
• IS business partner for the  SVP Supply, Developing Markets  and the regional Supply Directors  as well as the Heads of  Manufacturing, Quality, Procurement,  and Finance. 
• Supply systems strategy and architecture; including evaluation of new IT solutions to respond to new business requirements
• Demand Management, project delivery, process improvement programmes
• M&A related IT activities

experiences.title: Program/Project Manager
experiences.description: Program and Project Management for multinational clients

experiences.title: Nordic Professional Services Manager
experiences.description: Managing Professional Services group for Presales and Implementation of B2B E-commerce solutions

activities.title: Ich hätte mir zum Start meines Berufslebens einen Mentor an meiner Seite gewünscht, der mich begleitet, den Einstieg leichter macht und mir ein paar…
It’s a delicate conversation but it needs to be had. Finally someone in #power speaking the truth. #humanitarianassistance #blacklivesmatters…
Just a reminder that if you died, your job would be posted online within 24 hours. The weekends are for you to recharge, not work.
